name: Skola Hodanja
summary:
This is the story of Svojislav who was accustomed to walking the way he was taught by his mother. 
　　However his four friends each try to teach him their style of walking convinced that theirs is the best way. 
　　Svojislav has a hard time getting away from his "redeemers" but having done so, he continues walking the way he always has.
